    Overview: Hybrid OA data

Overview: Hybrid OA data

Source: vignettes/overview.Rmd
overview.Rmd
library(hoaddata)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

Datasets

This package provides the following data tables.

oam_hybrid_jns

Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor. Data were gathered from https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM and enriched with ISSN variants.

oam_hybrid_jns
#> # A tibble: 11,017 × 3
#>    vertrag                    issn_l    issn     
#>    <chr>                      <chr>     <chr>    
#>  1 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0306-0322 0306-0322
#>  2 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0306-0322 1865-8717
#>  3 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0003-5696 0003-5696
#>  4 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0003-5696 1613-0421
#>  5 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 1438-2091 1438-2091
#>  6 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 1438-2091 1868-9426
#>  7 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0232-8461 0232-8461
#>  8 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0232-8461 2196-6761
#>  9 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0003-6390 0003-6390
#> 10 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen) 0003-6390 2156-7093
#> # … with 11,007 more rows

Number of investigated journals: 5658

By agreement

oam_hybrid_jns %>%
  group_by(vertrag) %>%
  summarise(journals = n_distinct(issn_l)) %>%
  arrange(desc(journals))
#> # A tibble: 20 × 2
#>    vertrag                    journals
#>    <chr>                         <int>
#>  1 Springer Hybrid (DEAL)         2116
#>  2 Wiley Hybrid (DEAL)            1412
#>  3 Sage (BSB)                      980
#>  4 CUP (BSB)                       332
#>  5 TaylorFrancis (ZBW)             270
#>  6 De Gruyter (SUB Göttingen)      105
#>  7 Karger (BSB)                     71
#>  8 De Gruyter (ZBW)                 70
#>  9 ACM (hebis)                      60
#> 10 IOP (TIB)                        56
#> 11 RSC (TIB)                        38
#> 12 Nature (MPDL)                    35
#> 13 Hogrefe (SUB Göttingen)          32
#> 14 AIP (TIB)                        30
#> 15 BMJ (BSB)                        28
#> 16 SPIE (TIB)                       11
#> 17 Thieme 2 (ZB MED)                 6
#> 18 Portland Press (TIB)              5
#> 19 ECS (TIB)                         2
#> 20 Thieme 1 (ZB MED)                 1

jn_ind

Aggregated data about the prevalence of Creative Commons license variants by year and hybrid journal as obtained from Crossref.

jn_ind
#> # A tibble: 94,496 × 6
#>    issn_l    cr_year cc       cc_total jn_all    prop
#>    <chr>     <fct>   <fct>       <int>  <int>   <dbl>
#>  1 0001-0782 2017    NA              0    281 0      
#>  2 0001-0782 2018    NA              0    302 0      
#>  3 0001-0782 2019    NA              0    280 0      
#>  4 0001-0782 2020    NA              0    268 0      
#>  5 0001-0782 2021    NA              0    318 0      
#>  6 0001-0782 2022    NA              0    242 0      
#>  7 0001-1541 2017    CC BY           4    454 0.00881
#>  8 0001-1541 2017    CC BY-NC        4    454 0.00881
#>  9 0001-1541 2018    CC BY-NC        8    342 0.0234 
#> 10 0001-1541 2018    CC BY           7    342 0.0205 
#> # … with 94,486 more rows

Number of active journals: 11839

Number of open access articles with Creative Commons license: 714216

Creative Commons Breakdown:

jn_ind %>%
  filter(!is.na(cc)) %>%
  group_by(cc) %>%
  summarise(articles = sum(cc_total)) %>%
  arrange(desc(articles))
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#>   cc          articles
#>   <fct>          <int>
#> 1 CC BY         457946
#> 2 CC BY-NC-ND   186755
#> 3 CC BY-NC       67640
#> 4 CC BY-NC-SA     1571
#> 5 CC BY-SA         260
#> 6 CC BY-ND          44

jn_aff

First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license

jn_aff
#> # A tibble: 1,497,816 × 6
#>    issn_l    cr_year country_code cc    articles_under_cc_variant articles_total
#>    <chr>       <int> <chr>        <chr>                     <int>          <int>
#>  1 0005-8912    2022 AT           NA                           19             47
#>  2 0147-8389    2022 SK           NA                            2              2
#>  3 0929-693X    2022 GR           NA                            1              1
#>  4 2589-014X    2022 NG           NA                           13             13
#>  5 0114-0582    2022 NZ           NA                           10             10
#>  6 0950-5423    2022 LT           NA                            2              2
#>  7 1359-0987    2022 MX           NA                            2              2
#>  8 1660-5373    2022 TH           NA                            1              1
#>  9 1023-8166    2022 CZ           NA                            1              1
#> 10 0268-9146    2022 CZ           NA                            1              1
#> # … with 1,497,806 more rows

cc_articles

Article-level affiliation data from first authors as obtained from OpenAlex.

cc_articles
#> # A tibble: 799,182 × 7
#>    doi                     issn_l    cr_year cc          country…¹ id    displ…²
#>    <chr>                   <chr>       <int> <chr>       <chr>     <chr> <chr>  
#>  1 10.1002/1438-390x.1017  1438-3896    2019 CC BY       AT        http… Univer…
#>  2 10.1002/1438-390x.1019  1438-3896    2019 CC BY-NC-ND US        http… United…
#>  3 10.1002/1438-390x.12015 1438-3896    2019 CC BY-NC-ND ZA        http… Univer…
#>  4 10.1002/1438-390x.12016 1438-3896    2019 CC BY-NC    JP        http… Kwanse…
#>  5 10.1002/1438-390x.12018 1438-3896    2019 CC BY-NC-ND JP        http… Japan …
#>  6 10.1002/1438-390x.12018 1438-3896    2019 CC BY-NC-ND JP        http… Okinaw…
#>  7 10.1002/1438-390x.12019 1438-3896    2019 CC BY       JP        http… Nation…
#>  8 10.1002/1438-390x.12021 1438-3896    2019 CC BY       US        http… Duke U…
#>  9 10.1002/1438-390x.12022 1438-3896    2019 CC BY       JP        http… Univer…
#> 10 10.1002/1438-390x.12024 1438-3896    2019 CC BY       FI        http… Univer…
#> # … with 799,172 more rows, and abbreviated variable names ¹​country_code,
#> #   ²​display_name
cc_articles %>%
  group_by(cc) %>%
  summarise(articles = n_distinct(doi))
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#>   cc          articles
#>   <chr>          <int>
#> 1 CC BY         456485
#> 2 CC BY-NC       66737
#> 3 CC BY-NC-ND   186706
#> 4 CC BY-NC-SA     1571
#> 5 CC BY-ND          44
#> 6 CC BY-SA         260

cr_md

Crossref metadata coverage.

cr_md
#> # A tibble: 63,905 × 9
#>    cr_year issn_l    article_total tdm_t…¹ orcid…² funde…³ abstr…⁴ ref_t…⁵ cat
